pull.title: Remove ChainParams::DefaultMinerThreads
pull.body: No longer relevant after #5957. This hack existed because of another hack where the numthreads parameter, on regtest, doubled as how many blocks to generate.

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Laanwj's Bitcoin Core fork - see README.md on "readme" branch

events.message:
Remove ChainParams::DefaultMinerThreads

No longer relevant after #5957. This hack existed because of another
hack where the numthreads parameter, on regtest, doubled as how many
blocks to generate.
